item.title: Delete your old internet past
item.description: My experience getting my information off of the Internet Recently I decided to learn about tools you can use to stalk find out information about Internet users, and I’ve been using them to find information I’ve published about myself on the internet that I really shouldn’t have. So, in this post I will show off the tools I used and my technique to finding information about myself that I’ve published on the internet, and find old accounts, so that you can stay safe on the internet.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This blog (and new site) meets the internet. Blog + New Site combined! I’m experimenting with Hugo now. Let’s see if it works out or not!

item.title: About
item.description: Well, who am I I’m a 14 year old Norwegian computer nerd who enjoys tinkering with code and software. I also like playing games. I sound really generic, don’t I? Maybe cause I am. What I’ve done and made I’ve: been in 3 organizations dabbling with computers. (Terrific Tea Studios, Neutron Technologies, Project Segfault) made a tool called Fixdows lived for 14 years (amazing accomplishment) Probably some more things I forgot.
